item.description: Obsidian 옵시디언, 원하는 정보만 쏙쏙 골라주는 Dataview - (3) (tistory.com) Structure of a Query - Dataview (blacksmithgu.github.io) Lists all pages that have a metadata field due and where due is before today § LIST WHERE due AND due < date(today) Lists the 10 most recently created pages in your vault that have the tag#status/open § LIST FROM "1-Allsensing" SORT file.

item.title: Because I could not stop for Death
item.description: Example:: 6 Example:: 2.4 Example:: -80 MVH3204(온습도센서모듈) § path includes MVH3204(온습도센서) TABLE file.tasks.text WHERE file.tasks Task all(전체) § Task not done(미 완료) § not done Task done(완료) § done Open tasks from Important Project § not done path includes 개발자료정리양식 Due befor 6th of December § not done due befor 2023-12-26 short mode Not match § WHERE !completed AND contains(text, "#todo") SORT text ASC.
